text: Denise Darcel (born Denise Billecard; 8 September 1924 â€“ 23 December 2011) was a French actress. She made movies in Hollywood. She played Gigi Mignon in Dangerous When Wet. She played Countess Marie in the movie Vera Cruz. Darcel was born in Paris, France. She died at age 87 in Los Angeles, California from emergency surgery to repair a torn aneurysm. title: Denise Darcel
